dublin_core.dcvalue: Biosignal processing and analysis is generally perceived by many students to be a challenging topic to understand and to become adept with the necessary analytical skills This is a direct consequence of the high mathematical content involved and the many abstract features of the topic The MATLAB and Mathcad software packages offer an excellent algorithm development environment for teaching biosignal processing and analysis modules and can also be used effectively in many biosignal and indeed bioengineering research areas In this paper traditional introductory and advanced biosignal processing and analysis syllabi are reviewed and the use of MATLAB and Mathcad for teaching and research is illustrated with a number of examples
